utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right. It’s a new day. All that stuff about Rachel, you don’t feel that now. It was crazy! You’re fine. You’re better than fine! You are, as your friend Tony would say, Grrrreat! Everything’s normal! She’s just your friend Rachel! Your friend Rachel. Your friend! Rachel.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi, sweetie.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, it’s your girlfriend, Rachel!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Are you, are you high?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I just had the most amazing bath.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Really? I don’t like baths.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wait, you like them with me.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Honey, it’s not the bath I enjoy, it’s the wet, naked lady.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, baths are so relaxing!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Really? What do you do? You just sit in there stewing in your own filth.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: How dirty do you think I am? I’m telling you, if you had some candles and some bubbles and some music, you would love it! It would take all of your stress away.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Honey, it’s 2:00 on a Wednesday and I’m watching Road Rules, how stressed do you think I am?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, Chandler, you got a minute? I-I really need to talk to you.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh! Uh, yeah! Is this a cold pizza talk or a leftover meatloaf talk?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, neither.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh my God, what’s up?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I don’t know. It’s-it’s just…lately, I’ve been feeling… Okay, here’s what it is… You know what? I feel a lot better, thanks!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh no-no, no you don’t, just come back.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right. Okay. You and Monica, friends for a long time, and sure there are rules, but then you went to London. Oh, no, but that’s different. I mean, there are rules there, too! You know what I mean?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Do you?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It was different for you guys! I mean, I mean, you were both in the same place, right?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: In London?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes. When Monica and I were in London, we were both in London.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You know what? This is a bad idea. Forget it. Forget it, and listen, do me a favor, this conversation was between you and me.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: If that.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi! Oh, Ross, don’t forget, we have that doctor’s appointment tomorrow!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Right.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey, are you going to find out the sex of the baby?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No-no, we talked about it. We don’t want to know. All we care about is that it’s happy and healthy.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yep! Happy and healthy! And cute!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: And smart!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Popular.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: With an aptitude for science.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Are you two talking about the same baby? Hey! Have you started off thinking of names yet?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh yeah! I’ve come up with a bunch of ideas!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Really? Me too!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Me too!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Really?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Uh huh! If it’s a girl, Phoebe, and if it’s a boy, Phoebo!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Maybe. But it wouldn’t hurt to have a backup, you know? Uh, Rach-Rach, what were you thinking?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay! I was thinking if it’s a girl, how about Sandrine? It’s French.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Huh. That’s a really pretty name for-for an industrial solvent.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay fine, what do you have?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, OK, it’s for a boy. Well, I know it’s a little out there, but…Darwin.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wow, oh my God, our child will be beaten to death in the schoolyard.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, by Sandrine.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You’re just saying that 'cause I said no to your name!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I’m really, really not.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: How-how about you each get five vetoes?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: All right.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That sounds fair.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah! I don’t think you’re going to need it though. Okay, check this out. If it’s a girl, Rain.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Veto.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Why?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Rain? Hi. Hi, my name is Rain. I have my own kiln, and my dress is made out of wheat.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I know her! I bought homemade soap from her at a Dead show!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, how about, for a guy, Thatcher?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross, why do you hate our child?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Fine, you go.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, James.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Huh.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: But only if it’s a girl.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, veto. How about—Ooh, I like Ruth! What about Ruth?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh! I’m sorry! Are we having an 89-year-old? How about Dayton?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Veto. Stewart?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Veto. Sawyer?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Veto. Helen?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Veto.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Is it me, or is veto starting to sound really good?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Boy, do I have a surprise for you!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Sex on the balcony?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, but someone’s really not going to get over that idea, are they?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What is it?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I drew you a bath!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Honey, I don’t like baths! Could you draw me a picture of us having sex on the balcony?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Please, could you just try it for me? Come on, I used all my best stuff! I-I-I lit some candles. I put on some music. I used bath salts, plus bubble bath! And got you this little plastic Navy ship. So it’s a boy bath!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, this does butch it up a bit.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I swear, if you try it, you will love it!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: All right, if I do this, can we at least discuss sex on the balcony?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Absolutely.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Bet I know how that discussion’s going to go.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: All right, this isn’t so bad. I like the flower smell! Which is okay, because I’ve got my boat.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh my God.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I told you you were a bath person! Hey, when you get out, maybe I can give you a facial!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I’m going to need a bigger boat.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I don’t think you had an open mind about the name Ruth. I mean, come on, little Ruthie Geller, how-how cute is that?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, oh my God! I can practically hear the mahjong tiles!

utterance.speaker: Dr. Long
utterance.content: Okay! All your tests look fine. Now, are you two interested in knowing the sex of the baby?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uh, no. No, we’re not.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: But you have it right there in that file? You could tell us whether it’s a boy or a girl? Dayton or Sandrine? Phoebe or Phoebo?

utterance.speaker: Dr. Long
utterance.content: That’s right. But if you don’t want to know…

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, no, we want to wait, right?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Right. Right.

utterance.speaker: Dr. Long
utterance.content: Oh, I’ll be right back. And, uh, I know it’s really not my place, but please don’t name your child Phoebo.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So, which of these babies do you think is the ugliest?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What? Rach! Come on, that’s terrible! They’re…uh…they’re babies. They’re-they’re all beautiful.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Third one from the left?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, why is it staring at me? I think it knows I’m talking about it. Don’t-don’t you—Wh—Wha—Hey!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You’re looking!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I didn’t!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I saw you!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay fine, I did. But I didn’t see anything, I swear.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Shame on you! Ugly baby judges you!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, but Ross just listen to me…

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, no, no, no! Don’t tell me! I don’t want to know!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: But I couldn’t even if I wanted to, because I don’t know! I swear; I didn’t see anything, and I don’t want to know! It was just a momentary lapse.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Momentary lapse. Don’t-don’t you have any self-control?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, a couple months late on the lecture, Ross.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hello?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I’m in the bathroom, can you come in here? I think there’s something wrong.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You know what? I-I think I’ll wait out here.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I’m in the bathtub.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh. What’s wrong?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I drew my own bath, but I did it wrong! The water’s tepid. The salt didn’t dissolve and is now… lodged places. And the scents I used don’t compliment each other. Eucalyptus and chamomile—Oh!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: The bath salts! They’re starting to effervesce! It’s different. It’s interesting.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, let’s talk about something else.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah! Sure, sure. So, what was going on with you today? Oh-oh-oh!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, I actually had the weirdest conversation with Joey. He was talking about rules and right and wrong and…

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I had the exact same conversation.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You did? What was he talking about?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I don’t know! Joey hasn’t had this much trouble getting out words since we saw him in Macbeth!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That was a long night.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: All right, let’s break this down. What exactly did he say to you?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, he was talking about rules.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Uh-huh.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Umm, and looking at people differently.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: He didn’t say anything about that to me.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What did he tell you?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: He was asking all these questions about you, me, and London. And, of course the glue that holds this all together, the rules.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay. So you, me and London. Looking at people differently. Maybe he wants to do what you and I did in London with someone.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: But what did he mean by rules?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wait a minute! He stopped talking the minute Phoebe came in!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Because he was looking at her differently.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: And Phoebe is his friend, so he thinks that would be breaking the rules!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: My God! He wants to do it with Phoebe in London!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You guys?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Just a minute! That’s Mrs. Tribbiani!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You don’t say anything.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Why would I say anything? That two of our best friends could start the greatest love affair of their lives! And they would have me to thank, and we could all start having babies?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I’m not going to let you say anything.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You just stay here!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, God!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, hey, Monica, I brought back your iron.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, you had that?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Uh-huh.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I thought I lost it. I got a new one, like, a month ago.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, just as well, I broke this one.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Nothing.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I mean, I-I, I really shouldn’t say. I mean, I’m really not supposed to.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Fine.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It’s a humdinger!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Then it’s really too bad that you can’t tell me.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Somebody likes you!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Is it Chandler?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, then tell him to stop staring!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It’s Joey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Really?! Joey?! You don’t say.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Is it something you’d be interested in?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I don’t know, I don’t know, I don’t know. You know, I mean, on the one hand, Mother may I? But y’know on the other hand… No. No, I can’t. We’re friends. No, oh, no. I don’t want to risk what we have.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I guess that makes sense. So, you think you’re going to talk to him?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Sure, yeah. I mean, it’s Joey. I don’t want him to get hurt. Well, I must say, I am on fire! First Chandler, now Joey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Not Chandler, just Joey.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Sure.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You know what? I’ve been thinking about it. I’m really coming around on the name Ruth. I think I would actually consider naming our child that.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Rach, I-I can’t tell you how-how much that means to me! Ohh… Wait a minute. Wait a minute. You-you hated the name Ruth! Why-why would you change your mind? Unless, you know we’re never going to have to use it. You did see the folder. You know it’s a boy!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I didn’t see anything! I actually changed my mind about the name.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I don’t think so! You’re just giving me Ruth so you’ll get to name it when it’s a boy, and that’s when you’ll swoop in and name him Heath or Blaine or Sequoia.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I would—Sequoia?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Veto.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Fine.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Unless… You anticipated that I would figure all this out and you know that it actually is a girl, and you really do want her to be named Ruth! Well, I’m not falling for that! Okay? Ruth is off the table!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: But Ross, you want the name Ruth!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Not like this!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey. Well, what’s up?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Umm, Joey, I know.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I knooow.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Whaaat?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I know about your feelings.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh my God. You do?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yes, and I’m sorry. I-I know things worked out for Chandler and Monica, but that’s very rare.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I know. I know. And this is so much more complicated than it was for those guys. I mean, it’s Rachel for God sakes.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: For God sakes, it’s Rachel!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I know. I know. And she’s not only my friend; she’s my pregnant friend! She’s my pregnant friend who’s Ross’ ex!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah that’s Rachel. Beat me over the head with it.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What am I going to do? You know, and I keep, I keep trying to get rid of these feelings, y’know? I stayed up all last night and made a list of everything I don’t like about her. You want to hear it?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: She made me switch to light Mayo. That’s it! That’s all I got! And, you know what? It tastes the same and my pants fit better!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Joey, I just think you’re getting worked up over nothing. This is probably just a crush.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You think?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Absolutely! Y’know, you get this rush of feelings, but then it goes away.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, just a crush! That’s all this is! It’s a crush! I’m Joey; I don’t get deep feelings.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: That’s right, there you go! Crushes happen all the time! I know I’ve had them for all you guys. Well, except for Ross and Chandler. And I’m sure you’ve had them for us.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Not really.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Mm-hmm. Throw me a bone here.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So, I uh… I called the doctor and now we both know the sex of the baby.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That’s right. The student has become the master.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross, I swear, I don’t know.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, come on, you know it’s a girl!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: A what?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You really didn’t know?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: We’re having a girl?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: That’s what you just said!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You said girl!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes. I’m… I’m sorry. I’m so sorry.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I’m not! We’re having a girl! Sometimes I can’t believe it’s with you—But still! We’re having a girl!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I know! I know. You know what? I’m putting Ruth back on the table!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, yes! We’ll have ourselves a little baby Ruth…

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Permission to veto.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yes, please.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Do I smell essential oils?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, I’m going to take a bath. I’m just going to get a magazine.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What do you think you’re doing?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: L-leaving my troubles behind?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I know that you’re new at this, but this is completely unacceptable bath decorum.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, it’s so hard to care when you’re this relaxed.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Fine, you can have the bath, but I am taking your boat. Now you’re just a girl in a tub!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hi, Bubbles. Manly. Well, I just thought I would drop by and let you know how it went with Joey.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You told her?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: She pulled it out of me! She’s like a conversational wizard! How’d it go?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, you were wrong, he doesn’t like me!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah! How would you like it if I sent you to Lee Majors’ house and told you that he liked you, and you went down there and you found out that he didn’t like you? How would you feel?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I don’t think I’d care.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Really? Lee Majors is hot!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hello?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: We’re in the bathroom!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Why?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Because it’s a relaxing and enjoyable time!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What are you guys doing in here?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God! A friend he’s looking at differently, but it’s wrong. It’s Rachel!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You like Rachel?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It’s no big deal, okay? Phoebe and I talked about it. It’s just a crush! It’s going to go away! Dude, you gotta rearrange your bubbles! Oh!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Mazel tov.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey! Ross and I were looking for you! What are we all doing in here? Oh, my!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Honey, cover it up with the boat!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hello?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes we’re all in here and we would love for you to join us!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well hey! What’s going on? Ooh, cool boat——Oh, no. Hey, did you, did you tell them?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, I was waiting for you!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Tell us what?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: We’re having a girl.

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Oh, wow! Yay! Wow! Hooray! Oh, man!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I’ll…I’ll get you later!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right. It’s a new day, and it’s just a crush, that’s all! Just a little crush! All that worrying I was doing, that was crazy. Crazy! Like my friend here the bird would say, "it was cuckoo!" Everything’s going to be fine. It’s just a crush.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi, sweetie.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I love you.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It sure is nice to do this together, isn’t it?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah. And what you’re doing feels so good.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I’m not touching you.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You’re not?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It’s the salts.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, sweet Lord. New realms of pleasure!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Whatever keeps you off the balcony, big guy!
